project_description: A simple Flutter application that switches between displaying a bird (with clock icon) and a dog (with person icon) when the text is clicked.
architecture_overview: The project uses the Cubit pattern for state management. The main components include a single screen and a cubit to manage the state of the displayed animal.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen : click on text
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit : toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> AnimalState : update state
AnimalState -> AnimalDisplay : update UI
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using the Cubit pattern. The AnimalCubit toggles between displaying a bird and a dog. The state is held in the AnimalState and is updated by calling the toggleAnimal method in the AnimalCubit. The updated state is then reflected in the AnimalDisplay widget.
navigation_flow: The application has a single screen (HomeScreen) that displays the AnimalDisplay widget. No additional navigation is required.
